text.title: US Soccer: Seattle Sounders fall to LA Galaxy 1-0
text.head: US Soccer: Seattle Sounders fall to LA Galaxy 1-0
Sources

list.item: Scott French. "LA Galaxy 1, Seattle Sounders 0" — Major League Soccer , April 12, 2015
Oliver Todd. "LA Galaxy 1-0 Seattle Sounders: Alan Gordon heads in to lift Galaxy from foot of the Western Conference" — Daily Mail , April 12, 2015
